definition: to accept to hear a case/to handle (a service)
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: He is waiting to find out if the courts will accept his case.
sentences.chinese: 他正等着看法院是否会受理此案。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the reception and examination of appeal should be standardized.
sentences.chinese: 再次，应规范立卷受理和立案审查两个阶段。

sentences.english: We are handling your complaints, and we will call you back in 3 to 7 working-days.
sentences.chinese: 你的投诉我们已经受理，三至七个工作日会给您回音。

sentences.english: If a lawsuit is filed due to disputes of torts , the people's court may accept it directly.
sentences.chinese: 因侵权纠纷起诉的，人民法院可以直接受理。

sentences.english: I'm afraid we can't accept perishable goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里恐怕不能受理易腐烂的物品。

sentences.english: But it seems amazing that the courts of this country allowed him to pursue this case.
sentences.chinese: 不过，英国法院受理他这个案子似乎也让人吃惊不小。

sentences.english: The notification in the preceding paragraph shall explain the reason of its rejection in writing.
sentences.chinese: 前项不受理之书面通知，应叙明理由。

sentences.english: Have you failed to attend a hearing on removability or inadmissibility within the last five years?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有出席在过去五年内就撤换，或受理听证？

sentences.english: The the China Center of Adoption Affairs(CCAA)does not accept the adoption documents directly submitted by single person.
sentences.chinese: 中国收养中心不受理个人直接递交的收养文件。

sentences.english: They will wait after the end of this year's pilgrimage to re-opening Umrah Visa application.
sentences.chinese: 之后将等待今年朝觐结束后，再行开放受理副朝签证。

sentences.english: As the name implies the courts of appeals have appel late jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，上诉法院有受理上诉的裁判权。

sentences.english: I think the restaurant accepts credit cards.
sentences.chinese: 我想餐厅一定会受理信用卡的。

sentences.english: Other price-related violations which ought to be accepted by the price administrative department.
sentences.chinese: 应当由价格主管部门受理的其他价格违法行为。

sentences.english: Before that, patent appeals went to circuit courts of appeal.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，专利上诉由巡回上诉法院受理。

sentences.english: The court dismissed the case because of lack of evidence.
sentences.chinese: 法院因证据不足而不受理此案。

sentences.english: Other circumstances falling out of the scope for accepting exposures of price-related violations.
sentences.chinese: 不属于价格违法行为举报受理范围的其他情形。

definition: to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
to file a complaint/to appeal (to an authority, a higher court of justice etc)/complaint/appeal
to conclude a case/to wind up
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to adjudicate/to finish a trial/to try and pass verdict
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
